name: Meta Car
description: MetaCar is an important part of the MetaWorld ecosystem. In the MetaWorld ecosystem, you will own many of your assets, such as gold coins (RichMoon), skins (MetaCloth), land (MetaLand), houses (MetaHouse), and vehicles MetaCar. MetaCar is the only liquid token in the automotive NFT market. You can use MetaCar to buy NFT, mint NFT, upgrade NFT, and similarly, by staking RichMoon tokens, you can get MetaCar.
